footerTitle: The optimal solution for service providers to efficiently manage their business and meet customer requests. HomeFix allows you to add your services, such as property painting, carpentry work, electrical services, and other specialties you offer.
hero_description: We provide top-notch home repair services to keep your house in perfect condition.
termsText: By using our website, you agree to the terms and conditions of our home repair services. Users must be over 18 years old and provide accurate information when requesting a service. The service cost is determined before confirmation, with multiple payment options available. Orders can be canceled up to 24 hours in advance without fees; after that, a cancellation fee may apply. We guarantee service quality but are not responsible for any indirect damages. Your personal data is protected and used only to provide the service. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. For more information, contact us via email or phone.
agreeToTerms: I agree to the terms & conditions
Download the app to explore deals and ea: Download the app to explore deals and ease of booking.

deleteAccountDesc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
contactTitle: We Are Here to Serve You, Stay in Touch with Us
contactText: You can contact us directly for any inquiries or assistance. Our team is ready to respond quickly and professionally.

features.whyDesc: The perfect solution for service providers to manage their business effectively and meet customer requests efficiently. HomeFix allows you to add your services, such as property painting, carpentry, electrical work, and other specialties you offer. You can manage your appointments flexibly, accept or reject requests, and track their status with ease.
features.description1: Ease of tracking every order from the moment it is placed until it reaches the customer, with instant notifications for every update.
features.description2: The application allows you to manage your services efficiently, track orders in real-time, and improve your performance to provide a professional experience for customers.
features.description3: We ensure the protection of your data and the privacy of your customers using advanced security technologies.

Services.title: Comprehensive Home Services
Services.description: We provide professional solutions for all your home needs, from maintenance and cleaning to installation and repair, with quality and reliability.

howItWorks.title: Create the services you need with ease and security
howItWorks.subtitle: Now request your services or spare parts effortlessly through our app
howItWorks.createRequestDesc: Create service requests for what you need, such as window repairs or home cleaning, and wait for offers from service providers.
howItWorks.manageRequestsDesc: Easily control your orders; you can cancel a request or track its status in real-time for the best experience.
howItWorks.chooseBestOfferDesc: Receive price offers from service providers, compare them, and choose the one that best suits your needs and budget.
howItWorks.startShoppingDesc: Browse the available products in the marketplace, add what you need to your cart, and enjoy an easy and secure shopping experience.
howItWorks.listServicesOrProductsDesc: If you are a service provider or seller, you can add your services or products to the app to reach more customers.
howItWorks.efficientCommunicationDesc: Use the in-app chat system to communicate easily and effectively with service providers or buyers.

aboutUs.title: What is HomeFix?
aboutUs.description: HomeFix is a comprehensive app that connects customers with professional home maintenance technicians, providing a seamless and secure experience to complete maintenance tasks effortlessly. Through the app, any technician can register and offer their services, while customers can request home maintenance services such as plumbing, electricity, air conditioning, carpentry, cleaning, and more.
aboutUs.step1: The customer submits a maintenance request specifying the issue and location.
aboutUs.step2: Nearby technicians receive the request and can offer price estimates.
aboutUs.step3: The customer selects the best offer based on price, ratings, and estimated time.
aboutUs.step4: The service is completed with secure payment options via the app, either electronically or in cash.
aboutUs.feature1: Easy to Use - A simple and fast interface for booking services anytime.
aboutUs.feature2: Certified Technicians - Ensures high-quality work through customer ratings and reviews.
aboutUs.feature3: Service Variety - Covers various home maintenance fields professionally and efficiently.
aboutUs.feature4: Secure Payment - Provides convenient electronic payment options via trusted gateways.
aboutUs.feature5: Fast Support - A dedicated support team to resolve any issues for customers and technicians.
aboutUs.finalMessage: HomeFix is the smart solution to keep your home in perfect condition!
